description:
runtime/pprof, misc/pprof: correct profile of total allocations.

The previous heap profile format did not include buckets with
zero used bytes. Also add several missing MemStats fields in
debug mode.

messages.text: This is at the expense of larger memory profile files, but allows go tool pprof --alloc_space to show correct information.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, remy@archlinux.org),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d34e1877830c ***

runtime/pprof, misc/pprof: correct profile of total allocations.

The previous heap profile format did not include buckets with
zero used bytes. Also add several missing MemStats fields in
debug mode.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev, remy
http://codereview.appspot.com/6249068

subject: code review 6249068: runtime/pprof, misc/pprof: correct profile of total all...
